info.title: Navigate to the previous radio button

setupScript.name: setFocusOnSecondRadioButton
setupScript.description: sets focus on the second radio button

user: With focus on the 'Deep dish' radio button, navigate to the previous radio button.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Deep dish' radio button, navigate to the previous radio button.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: State of the radio button, 'checked', is conveyed
Position of the radio button, 1, is conveyed
Number of radio buttons in the group, 3, is conveyed
